channel.title: UniversalX - Dedi - Hosting Vencillio - Perfect Combat - Minigames - Skilling
channel.description:
100 %credits to Play_boy We loved his server and decided to host it on a dedi!
Our own name is UniversalX.
Client Link1: http://universalx.ddns.net/download/UniversalX.jar Client Link2: http://www.mediafire.com/download/sxnphgacur0m7d9/UniversalX.jar
Features
Combat Equipment requirements Equipment weights Equipment degrading 100% Melee 100% Range 100% Mage
Play In Fullscreen!
Skilling 100% Agility 100% Cooking 100% Fishing 100% Crafting 100% Fletching 100% Firemaking 100% Herblore 100% Farming 100% Mining 100% Smithing 90% Modern magic, 100% Ancient magicks 100% Prayer 100% Runecrafting 100% Thieving 100% Slayer 100% Woodcuttin
Great Exp Rates! Custom Mystery Box Game!
Minigames Duel Arena Single player jad! Barrows! Dagannoth kings! king Black Dragon! Chaos Elemental! Ice Queen! Corporeal Beast! God Wars! With more boss's being added constantly!
Server information:
Stable, No Lag VPS Hosted 24/7 Edgeville Home Base Great Economy Pking
